name: Bubble Shooter (itch)
description:
Bubble Shooter 3D is a fun arcade game, which consists of removing balls of the same color from a board. The challenge is to get the highest score in as few shots as possible.

98 exciting levels.
Customizing the game, you can change the combination of colors and designs of the Balls, also darken and brighten the sky.
Within the mechanics of the game there are special balls that will help you to advance.
